content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Munich to be a great place to live. So, let's discuss the rental price. What's the highest price you're willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm willing to pay up to 1200 Euros.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that price. It's far too low for the quality of the apartment. I'm looking for a more competitive offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I can offer 1400 Euros.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's more like it. But I'm still not convinced it's the best offer. Can you do better?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 1400 Euros is the best offer I can make. I believe it's a fair price for the quality of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe there's room for improvement in your offer. If you're not willing to reconsider, then I'm afraid we cannot reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I'm sorry we couldn't reach an agreement. 'TERMINATE'
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
